name: The Descent Errata
description:
Are you worthy of being the first Human to travel down the space elevator?
No, probably not.

Compared to the game jam entry, these are the fixes/issues this version corrects:

Adjusted time scale to avoid waiting 5 hours for the first event to occur.
Adjusted 1 collision element.
Adjusted projectile (it had no collision).
Adjusted Win Screen.

Future planned eventual updates:
Target Spawning/Score Keeping system. You'll actually have to defend the elevator to... well... get to earth.
